name: BLACKPINK FAN GAMES
description:
Developped by an BLINK, for all the BLINK ! 

Test your knowledge of BLACKPINK whether you're an BLINK or just a K-POP fan ! 

BLACKPINK Trivia Quiz is the funniest quiz application on BLACKPINK, you will love challenging yourself to see if you're truly an BLINK !

Show to the world that BLINK is the best fandom !
